question: Who has been appointed to examine sub categorization of Other Backward Classes (OBCs) by President Ram Nath Kovind?
explanation: President Ram Nath Kovind appointed a five member Commission under Delhi High Court's former Chief Justice G Rohini to examine sub categorization of Other Backward Classes (OBCs). This has been done to make sure that the more backward among the OBC communities avail the benefits of reservation. This decision has been taken on the birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi. The commission will examine the extent of inequitable distribution of benefits of reservation among the communities included in the broad category of OBCs.
